Specific Discussion</option> <option value="https://sites.google.com/site/fjatestsite/f-jam-news">Site News</option> <option value="https://www.facebook.com/groups/131537443544094/" target="_blank">F-Jam On Facebook</option> </select> <script language="JavaScript" type="text/JavaScript"> <!-- function HDD_Menu(targetpage,selected){ if (selected.options[selected.selectedIndex].value!=""){ eval(targetpage+".location='"+selected.options[selected.selectedIndex].value+"'");}} //--> </script><select name="EXTRAS" onChange="HDD_Menu('parent',this)" style="color:#000000; background:#F1F345; font-weight:bold;" > <option value="" selected>EXTRAS</option> <option value="https://sites.google.com/site/fjatestsite/useful-links">Useful Links</option> <option value="https://sites.google.com/site/fjatestsite/help/mp3playertemplate">MP3 Player</option> <option value="window.open('http://www.pageresource.com/jscript/jex5.htm','mywindow','width=400,height=200'">TEST</option> </select>
